# Adopted (Trait)
## Overview
**Adopted**: You were adopted and raised by someone not of your race, and raised in a society not your own. As a result, you picked up a race trait from your adoptive parents and society, and may immediately select a race trait from your adoptive parentsâ€™ race.  

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 59
